syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Economics 9708

topic.topic_name: The price system and the microeconomy (AS Level)

subtopic.sub_topic_name: The interaction of demand and supply

content.description: definition of market equilibrium and disequilibrium
effects of shifts in demand and supply curves on equilibrium price and quantity
relationships between different markets: joint demand (complements), alternative demand (substitutes), derived demand, joint supply
functions of price in resource allocation; rationing, signalling (transmission of preferences) and incentivising
